values.description: Something is starting to happen to [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. [PAWN_pronoun] has been rubbing [PAWN_possessive] nose a lot, and it looks like it's starting to grow! Has [PAWN_pronoun] noticed?

[PAWN_nameDef]'s nose is getting wider and flatter, but that's nothing compared to what's happening to [PAWN_possessive] jaws. They've begun to surge outwards, bones growing and warping and teeth shifting. [PAWN_possessive] whole face is changing!
It's undeniable now, [PAWN_nameDef] is growing a snout. Broad nostrils, thick lips, and a large jaw adorn [PAWN_possessive] face.
